briefTitle: Vascular Changes Due to Different Treatments of Lymphedema Secondary to Postoperative Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Vascular Changes Due to Different Treatments of Lymphedema Secondary to Postoperative Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Doppler Ultrasound- velocity of blood flow
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women diagnosed with breast cancer undergoing surgical treatment combined with axillary dissection or sentinel node biopsy
* diagnosed with moderate to severe unilateral lymphedema

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women with muscle-tendon injury and / or joint damage in the -affected limb,
* skin disorders,
* diabetes,
* circulatory disease not controlled, -chemotherapy
* radiotherapy,
* diagnostic with metastasis in the upper limb
* women pregnancy.
